LanguageData.AG.RegenerateGenes: Regenerate genes based on the current game-settings
LanguageData.AG.GatherYieldDesc: The amount of milk or wool yielded from this creature.
LanguageData.AG.ValueTooltop: Gene value. Applied to animal's base stats.
LanguageData.AG.ParentTooltop: The parental value this animal inherited from. Will be empty for wild or newly generated animals with no parents.
LanguageData.AG.Settings1Tooltip: Randomly selected from a normal distribution with these settings...
LanguageData.AG.Settings2Tooltip: Added/subtracted from inherited genes. Randomly selected from a normal distribution with these settings...
LanguageData.AG.ColorNormalTooltip: Traditional red, yellow, green color scheme.
LanguageData.AG.ColorRPGTooltip: RPG style item quality color scheme.
LanguageData.AG.HumanlikeGenesTooltip: Gives genes to all humanlike pawns as well as animals.
LanguageData.AG.OmniscientTooltip: When disabled, you will only be able to see genetic details of your own colony's animals.
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.GeneValueToolTip: 100% means that value will be affected linearly of the percent of the genes. These are calculated addative so two genes with 115% will get a 30% value increase. This setting can be used to change the value of each percent. So setting this value to 50% will instead result in a 15% value increase in the previous example.
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ShowGenesInAnimalsTabTool: Enable to show the genes in the Animal Tab.
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ShowGenesInWildlifeTabToo: Enable to show the genes in the Wildlife Tab.
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ShowBothParentsInPawnTab: Show both parents in Pawn Tab
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ShowBothParentsInPawnTabT: Enable to show both parents in Pawn Tab
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ShowGeneticsTabTooltip: Enable to show the Genetics Tab
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ColonyManager.IntegrateTo: Check to use Animal Genetics and Colony Manager together
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ColonyManager.Description: When animals are to be designated for taming or butchering, use AnimalGenetics to select an animal
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ColonyManager.TamingToolt: Use gene preferences to determine animals that should be tamed
LanguageData.AnimalGenetics.ColonyManager.ButcheringT: Use gene preferences to determine animals that should NOT be butchered
